item.title: My worst nightmare...
item.description: I don’t know if you have seen thisÂ about a person who’s iCloud account was hacked. But man does it freak me out. As a person who relies pretty heavily on cloud-based storage devices and does some cloud-computing based research as well, this is a pretty freaky scenario. Time to go back everything up again…
